ygData.subject: research
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, good information thanks.  I just made my first attempt to create Project lightning.  It was a flop.  Pretty depressing after spending all that time
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, good information thanks. I just made my first attempt to create Project
lightning. It was a flop. Pretty depressing after spending all that time
learning new languages and getting all the elements to have it fail without
event.

Anybody know how to increase skill at Research? I know training on it at
the guildmaster is capped so is the only way to improve it only by trying
over and over again? Too bad I can't just throw all my 70+ training points
into it...wonder why I've been saving it.

-- Lim'Dul

>Well, I made level 16 last night so I decided to try research for the
>first time. I had been collecting runes for a while, so I had a >sizable
>collection in the bank. Just thought I would share the results.

>Project Lightning - I had enough runes to attempt this spell twice. >The
>first attempt failed, the second one succeeded! My first spell! Ok, >1
>out of 2 is not bad.
